item.title: [Help] 1 Error i Can't Fix
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

you need that void…weird source i assume
try

if(playerHasItem(1436)){ deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); addItem(runeID, Craftable); addSkillXP(XP*playerLevel[20], 20); sendMessage("You craft some of the essence into "+runeName+"s."); }
if you dont have that void either ill post them

item.title: [Help] 1 Error i Can't Fix
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

That’s a statement…you need an opening bracket.

if ((playerHasItemAmount(1436,1)) {
{
deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1);
addItem(runeID, Craftable);
addSkillXP(XP*playerLevel[20], 20);
}
}
sendMessage("You craft some of the essence into "+runeName+“s.”);
}

Read full topic
